pages.title: Black Bear
pages.text: The American black bear ($(o)Ursus americanus$()), or simply black bear, is a medium-sized bear endemic to North America.$(br2)It is the continent's smallest and most widely distributed bear species.$(br2)American black bears are omnivores, with their diets varying greatly depending on season and location.

pages.title: Black Bear
pages.text: Relative Size: ★★☆☆☆$(br2)Most active during Dawn/Dusk$(br2)4 Colors ($(o)4 Rare Colors$())$(br2)Favourite Food: minecraft:sweet_berries$(br2)Number of Offspring: 2$(br2)Growth time: 8 Days
